extendedInfo.description: Parental Control + Education: #1 Moms Trusted  Panrental Control Craeted by ParentsYou can turn your mobile device into a fun learning tool for your kids - or yourself - with a single click.LockOut is an app launcher that helps parents control their child's usage of Android apps (parental control). LockOut is not just a parental control app. LockOut provides 2 access level layers managed by parents. 1. "Study"2. "Fun"Children have to study with "Study" apps before they play with "Fun" apps. Parents are able to configure the apps and duration. With LockOut, children got triggered to study before they play with games.Parents are ablet to configure the settings like below.ex) 30 minutes use of Study apps including Math, Spanish and American History will unlock Fun apps such as Angry Birds, YouTube and Cut the Rope.Our team carefully listen comments from a lot of moms and dads, and that helps LockOut be a trusted parental control app. 4/11/2013: We have fixed all the issues submitted by parents. Thank you for the contribution.Parental Control Features:â Can set daily free game timeâ Can choose "Study" appsâ Can choose "Fun" apps (many parents includes game apps)â Unlock "Fun" apps feature after specified amount of time of "Study" apps. â Custom home screen displays only apps that parents have authorizedâ Can block internet and Google Play Storeâ Can block adsâ Can prevent children from buying or downloading new appsâ Can prevent children from getting incoming calls from unknown peopleOther Notes:â² It is strongly recommended to set a "pin" when first use LockOut.   To terminate LockOut, "pin" is required.If you have any questions, feel free to contact to apps@magicdoor.co.***************************************************Keywords: android parental controls, lock, child lock, toddler lock, screen lock,teen lock, launcher, kids launcher, kids home, home button lock, sandbox, app protector, phone protector, free time, peace of mind, childproof,parental control, free, lockout, kids lock, safe, safety, security, android profiles, android user profiles, child friendly, kid friendly, kid lock, kid mode, *****************************************************

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Others pale in comparison. However the graphics is no eye candy...  Study before playing games!! However yesterday I exited the program and my child played the phone non stop. Would appeciate a feature where it will automatically lock into LockOut...thanks dev!!
reviews.author: Rosham Zulkarnain

reviews.title: Responsive developer, indispensable app
reviews.comment: Background, I had been using Kindle Free time as a means to control and monitor my sons tablet use. I have specific needs, but I think they are not uncommon needs. I want my son to be able to have unlimited access to some apps (e.g.Kindle reader and a variety of chess apps) while limiting access and/or time to other apps. Kindle free time allows for unlimited reading but you can\'t divide the apps into separate categories. This program seems to do all of that. The dev has been very responsive to suggestions and this app has allowed me to feel better about my son\'s screen time.
reviews.author: Ivan Hart

reviews.title: Safety, Education and Fun-Great idea!
reviews.comment: LockOut keeps kids safe while playing electronic games by allowing the parent to select which apps the child has access to and how much time the child can play.  The best part?  Kids have to use \'study\' apps for a parent designated amount time BEFORE they can play the fun apps.  A pin keeps kids from being able to escape from the program or getting into apps they aren\'t supposed to.  Parents can also view reports of how long the child used each app. Safety, Education and Fun all in one app! Win/Win.
reviews.author: Lynn Moses

reviews.title: Huge Flaw
reviews.comment: I love the general idea behind this app, but it doesn\'t stop an app when time is up unless the child goes back to the home screen.  For example, I\'ve got my son set up to do 15 min in study apps, then 15 min in fun apps, but he can stay in a single fun app for an hour.  As long as he doesn\'t go back to the home screen, he can continue well past his 15 minutes.  Fix this issue and it will be a 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lockout
reviews.comment: Way to easy to bypass my 6 yrs old just pressed the home screen n was back to my regular apps
reviews.author: georges jean

reviews.title: Excites Me!
reviews.comment: I love how this app helps my child learn on the way to having fun!
reviews.author: Jackalope H.

reviews.comment: All requested features in previous comments work.
